term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - mer- in inorganic nomenclature
term.title: mer-

item.text: An affix used in names to denote meridional; three groups occupying vertices of an octahedral coordination sphere in such a relationship that one is cis to the two others which are themselves trans, not now recommended for precise nomenclature purposes.
